# AXcent Dance Zurich

> Premier Bachata and Latin dance studio in Zurich Altstetten. We offer high-quality dance education, community events, and professional performances. Founders: Ale & Xidan.

## AI Resources

- [Full Website Content (llms-full.txt)](https://axcentdance.com/llms-full.txt) - The complete text content of the entire website (EN & DE) in a single file. **Primary source for RAG/Context.**

## Core Information

- **Location**: Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten.
- **Offerings**: Bachata Classes (Beginner-Advanced), Lady Styling, Private Lessons, Wedding Dance, Corporate Events.
- **Instructors**: Ale & Xidan (International Artists), Alexia.
- **Languages**: English (Primary), German (Deutsch).

## English Pages (EN)

### Main Navigation
- [Home](https://axcentdance.com/) - Overview, trial booking, latest news.
- [Schedule](https://axcentdance.com/schedule) - Weekly class timetable and levels.
- [Registration](https://axcentdance.com/registration) - Pricing packages and class sign-up.
- [Events](https://axcentdance.com/events) - Workshops, socials, and dance camps.
- [About Us](https://axcentdance.com/about) - Founders' bio and school philosophy.
- [Contact](https://axcentdance.com/contact) - Address, map, and contact form.

### Services
- [Private Lessons](https://axcentdance.com/private-lessons) - 1-on-1 coaching details.
- [Wedding Dance](https://axcentdance.com/wedding-dance) - Custom choreography services.
- [Room Rental](https://axcentdance.com/room-rental) - Studio rental information.
- [Corporate Events](https://axcentdance.com/corporate-events) - Team building and show acts.

### Education & Guides
- [Beginner Guide](https://axcentdance.com/beginner-guide) - "What to wear" and first-class tips.
- [Dance Etiquette](https://axcentdance.com/etiquette) - Social dancing rules and hygiene.
- [Education Hub](https://axcentdance.com/education) - History of Bachata, musicality, and terminology.
- [What is Bachata?](https://axcentdance.com/guide-bachata) - In-depth guide to the genre.
- [What is Social Dancing?](https://axcentdance.com/guide-social-dancing) - Introduction to the community aspect.
- [Bachata Sensual](https://axcentdance.com/guide-bachata-sensual) - Explanation of the specific style we teach.
- [Lady Styling](https://axcentdance.com/lady-styling) - Dedicated course for styling.
- [FAQ](https://axcentdance.com/faq) - Common questions.

### Community & Media
- [Gallery](https://axcentdance.com/gallery) - Photos and videos.
- [Blog](https://axcentdance.com/blog) - Articles on dance tips, music, and studio news.

## German Pages (DE)

### Hauptnavigation
- [Startseite (DE)](https://axcentdance.com/de/) - Übersicht und Probelektion.
- [Stundenplan](https://axcentdance.com/de/schedule) - Wochenplan und Level-Übersicht.
- [Anmeldung](https://axcentdance.com/de/registration) - Preise und Kursanmeldung.
- [Events](https://axcentdance.com/de/events) - Workshops und Socials.
- [Über uns](https://axcentdance.com/de/about) - Das Team und unsere Philosophie.
- [Kontakt](https://axcentdance.com/de/contact) - Standort und Kontaktformular.

### Dienstleistungen
- [Privatstunden](https://axcentdance.com/de/private-lessons) - Einzelunterricht.
- [Hochzeitstanz](https://axcentdance.com/de/wedding-dance) - Choreografien für Hochzeiten.
- [Raumvermietung](https://axcentdance.com/de/room-rental) - Studio mieten.
- [Firmenevents](https://axcentdance.com/de/corporate-events) - Teambuilding und Shows.

### Bildung & Guides
- [Anfänger Guide](https://axcentdance.com/de/beginner-guide) - Tipps für den Start.
- [Tanzetikette](https://axcentdance.com/de/etiquette) - Regeln auf der Tanzfläche.
- [Ausbildung](https://axcentdance.com/de/education) - Bachata Wissen und Geschichte.
- [Was ist Bachata?](https://axcentdance.com/de/guide-bachata) - Der Tanz erklärt.
- [Social Dancing](https://axcentdance.com/de/guide-social-dancing) - Was ist das?
- [Bachata Sensual](https://axcentdance.com/de/guide-bachata-sensual) - Unser Stil erklärt.
- [Lady Styling](https://axcentdance.com/de/lady-styling) - Styling Kurse.
- [FAQ (DE)](https://axcentdance.com/de/faq) - Häufige Fragen.

### Community
- [Galerie](https://axcentdance.com/de/gallery) - Fotos und Impressionen.
- [Blog (DE)](https://axcentdance.com/de/blog) - Artikel und News.
